english.segment1: Welcomed in to the courts of the King. I've been ushered in to Your presence. Lord, I stand on Your merciful ground. Yet with every step tread with reverence
english.segment2: Welcomed in to the courts of the King. I've been ushered in to Your presence. Lord, I stand on Your merciful ground. Yet with every step tread with reverence
english.segment3: And I'll fall facedown. As Your glory shines around. Yes, I'll fall facedown. As Your glory shines around
english.segment4: Who is there in the heavens like You?. And upon the earth, who's Your equal?. You are far above, You're the highest of heights. We are bowing down to exalt You
english.segment5: And I'll fall facedown. As Your glory shines around. Yes, I'll fall facedown. As Your glory shines around
english.segment6: Yes, I'll fall facedown. As Your glory shines around. And I'll fall facedown. As Your glory shines around
english.segment7: So let Your glory shine around. Let Your glory shine around. King of glory, here be found. King of glory
english.segment8: So let Your glory shine around. Let Your glory shine around. King of glory, here be found. King of glory
english.segment9: So let Your glory shine around. Let Your glory shine around. King of glory, here be found. King of glory
english.segment10: So let Your glory shine around. Let Your glory shine around. King of glory, here be found. King of glory
english.segment11: And I'll fall facedown. As Your glory shines around. Yes, I'll fall facedown. As Your glory shines around, around.
english.segment12: God I'll fall facedown. As Your glory shines around. God, I'll fall facedown. As Your glory shines around
